verses.verse: And Adam <S%H120><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> Eve <S%H2332><s%> his wife; <S%H802><s%> and she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Cain, <S%H7014><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I have gotten <S%H7069><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> from the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And she again <S%H3254><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> Abel. <S%H1893><s%> And Abel <S%H1893><s%> was a keeper <S%H7462><s%> of sheep, <S%H6629><s%> but Cain <S%H7014><s%> was a tiller <S%H5647><s%> of the ground. <S%H127><s%>

And in process <S%H7093><s%> of time <S%H3117><s%> it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that Cain <S%H7014><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Abel, <S%H1893><s%> he also <S%H1571><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> of the firstborn <S%H1062><s%> of his flock <S%H6629><s%> and of the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof. And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had respect <S%H8159><s%> to Abel <S%H1893><s%> and to his offering: <S%H4503><s%>

But to Cain <S%H7014><s%> and to his offering <S%H4503><s%> he had not respect. <S%H8159><s%> And Cain <S%H7014><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> wroth, <S%H2734><s%> and his countenance <S%H6440><s%> fell. <S%H5307><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Cain, <S%H7014><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> are you wroth? <S%H2734><s%> and why <S%H4100><s%> is your countenance <S%H6440><s%> fallen? <S%H5307><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> you do well, <S%H3190><s%> shall you not be accepted? <S%H7613><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you do not well, <S%H3190><s%> sin <S%H2403><s%> lies <S%H7257><s%> at the door. <S%H6607><s%> And to you shall be his desire, <S%H8669><s%> and you shall rule <S%H4910><s%> over him.

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> talked <S%H559><s%> with Abel <S%H1893><s%> his brother: <S%H251><s%> and it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when they were in the field, <S%H7704><s%> that Cain <S%H7014><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H413><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> him.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Cain, <S%H7014><s%> Where <S%H335><s%> is Abel <S%H1893><s%> your brother? <S%H251><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> not: Am I my brother's <S%H251><s%> keeper? <S%H8104><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have you done? <S%H6213><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your brother's <S%H251><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> cries <S%H6817><s%> to me from the ground. <S%H127><s%>

And now <S%H6258><s%> are you cursed <S%H779><s%> from the earth, <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> has opened <S%H6475><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> your brother's <S%H251><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from your hand; <S%H3027><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> you till <S%H5647><s%> the ground, <S%H127><s%> it shall not from now on <S%H3254><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> to you her strength; <S%H3581><s%> a fugitive <S%H5128><s%> and a vagabond <S%H5110><s%> shall you be in the earth. <S%H776><s%>
And Cain <S%H7014><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> My punishment <S%H5771><s%> is greater <S%H1419><s%> than I can bear. <S%H5375><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> you have driven <S%H1644><s%> me out this day <S%H3117><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth; <S%H127><s%> and from your face <S%H6440><s%> shall I be hid; <S%H5641><s%> and I shall be a fugitive <S%H5128><s%> and a vagabond <S%H5110><s%> in the earth; <S%H776><s%> and it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that every <S%H3605><s%> one that finds <S%H4672><s%> me shall slay <S%H2026><s%> me.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Therefore <S%H3651><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> slays <S%H2026><s%> Cain, <S%H7014><s%> vengeance <S%H5358><s%> shall be taken on him sevenfold. <S%H7659><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> a mark <S%H226><s%> on Cain, <S%H7014><s%> lest <S%H1115><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> finding <S%H4672><s%> him should kill <S%H5221><s%> him.

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Nod, <S%H5113><s%> on the east <S%H6926><s%> of Eden. <S%H5731><s%>

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> his wife; <S%H802><s%> and she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Enoch: <S%H2585><s%> and he built <S%H1129><s%> a city, <S%H5892><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> after the name <S%H8034><s%> of his son, <S%H1121><s%> Enoch. <S%H2585><s%>

And to Enoch <S%H2585><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> Irad: <S%H5897><s%> and Irad <S%H5897><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Mehujael: <S%H4232><s%> and Mehujael <S%H4232><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Methusael: <S%H4967><s%> and Methusael <S%H4967><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Lamech. <S%H3929><s%>

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> to him two <S%H8147><s%> wives: <S%H802><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Adah, <S%H5711><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Zillah. <S%H6741><s%>
And Adah <S%H5711><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Jabal: <S%H2989><s%> he was the father <S%H1><s%> of such as dwell <S%H3427><s%> in tents, <S%H168><s%> and of such as have cattle. <S%H4735><s%>

And his brother's <S%H251><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Jubal: <S%H3106><s%> he was the father <S%H1><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> such as handle <S%H8610><s%> the harp <S%H3658><s%> and organ. <S%H5748><s%>

And Zillah, <S%H6741><s%> she also <S%H1571><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Tubalcain, <S%H8423><s%> an instructor <S%H3913><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> artificer <S%H2794><s%> in brass <S%H5178><s%> and iron: <S%H1270><s%> and the sister <S%H269><s%> of Tubalcain <S%H8423><s%> was Naamah. <S%H5279><s%>

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his wives, <S%H802><s%> Adah <S%H5711><s%> and Zillah, <S%H6741><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice; <S%H6963><s%> you wives <S%H802><s%> of Lamech, <S%H3929><s%> listen <S%H238><s%> to my speech: <S%H565><s%> for I have slain <S%H2026><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> to my wounding, <S%H6482><s%> and a young <S%H3206><s%> man to my hurt. <S%H2250><s%>
If <S%H3588><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%> shall be avenged <S%H5358><s%> sevenfold, <S%H7659><s%> truly Lamech <S%H3929><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and sevenfold. <S%H7659><s%>

And Adam <S%H120><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> again; <S%H5750><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Seth: <S%H8352><s%> For God, <S%H430><s%> said she, has appointed <S%H7896><s%> me another <S%H312><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of Abel, <S%H1893><s%> whom <S%H3588><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%> slew. <S%H2026><s%>

And to Seth, <S%H8352><s%> to him also <S%H1571><s%> there was born <S%H3205><s%> a son; <S%H1121><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Enos: <S%H583><s%> then <S%H227><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> men to call <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
